# The Battle of Singapore

* Singapore was a colony of the British Empire.
* They had a lot of soldiers in Singapore. 
* The Japanese invaded and won a battle
* The British soldiers surrendered
* Japanese soldiers ruled Singapore for years. They were really mean.
